NetworkUserHistoryRecent.name: NetworkUserHistoryRecent
NetworkUserHistoryRecent.description: Represents an Experience Cloud site user’s history of accessed records.

AccessTimestamp.description: The time at which the record was accessed.

ActionType.description: Indicates the action type taken by the user. The possible values are: Read Write

DomainName.description: The domain used to access the record.

FeedCommentId.description: Feed comment accessed by the user.

FeedItemId.description: Feed item accessed by the user.

NetworkId.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site used to access the record or comment.

NetworkUserId.description: User’s Experience Cloud site user ID to access the record or comment.

Url.description: The URL from which the user accessed the record.

UserType.description: The type of user who accessed this record. The possible values include: Standard Partner Customer Portal Manager Customer Portal User Guest High Volume Portal CSN Only Self Service
